description: Preorder Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven
title: Romancing SaGa 2 Remake Preorders - PC Version Discounted For Limited Time
Dragon Quest 3 HD-2D Preorders Are Live - Bonuses, Deals, And More

description:
1984 was an incredible year for movies, and Ghostbusters is arguably the best from that year. It gave us an enchanting alternate reality and has spawned five films, two animated television series, a bunch of documentaries, and so many toys. So why does it always feel like the subsequent movies we get are a pale imitation of the original? The first sequel, Ghostbusters II, was an early hint that things were never going to work out quite the same way again, and looking back on it from 2024, it feels like the kind of studio-run, bean-counted project that we expect to see in theaters even today.

The first Ghostbusters was an accident

The original film we got, an almost perfect mix of science-fiction, horror, and comedy, was not the Ghostbusters Dan Aykroyd had in mind when he first envisioned the project. The original script, set in 2012, had multiple teams of "ghost smashers" traveling between planets and dimensions. The Ecto-1 car wa
title: Ghostbuster II Paved The Way For Everything We Hate About Sequels Now

description: The latest Nintendo Direct was filled with game reveals, including a look at upcoming entries for popular franchises like Mario, Metroid, and Zelda. The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom, a new top-down adventure starring Zelda (finally!), is set to release on September 26. To commemorate the new Zelda game, Nintendo is releasing a special-edition Switch Lite on the same day. There's no word yet on when preorders will go live, but we'll make sure to update this article as soon as they
title: The Legend Of Zelda-Themed Nintendo Switch Lite Will Release Alongside Echoes Of Wisdom

description:
Readers of George R. R. Martin's Fire & Blood were well-aware that House of the Dragon Season 2 would have to include the infamous Blood and Cheese sequence. The scene in question may not be quite as shocking as Martin's Red Wedding, as seen in Game of Thrones, but it's definitely one of the most brutal moments in the book. Now, House of the Dragon showrunner Ryan Condal is opening up about why the show made certain changes to the scene.

Warning: the following contains spoilers from the Season 2 premiere of House of the Dragon. If you haven't seen the episode or don't want to know what's in it, stop reading now.

In the context of the episode, Blood (Sam C. Wilson) is a member of the City Watch who is loyal to Pri
title: House of the Dragon Showrunner Explains Why Blood And Cheese Scene Was Changed

description:
It has been more than 15 years since the Nintendo Wii got Metroid Prime 3: Corruption, bringing a supposed end to Samus Aran's first-person adventures. However, Metroid Prime 4 was announced in 2017, instantly becoming one of the Nintendo Switch's most anticipated games despite fans only knowing the name and the logo. In the years since, we have heard very little about the game's progress, though it now appears to be on track for a 2025 release again. Here is what we know about Metroid Prime 4 so far.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • Release date
  • What we know so far

Release date

Nintendo has not revealed a specific release date for Metroid Prime 4, but it has narrowed it down
title: Metroid Prime 4: Everything We Know

description:
Metroid Prime 4 has finally been given a proper unveiling, now renamed Metroid Prime 4: Beyond and with an announced release planned for 2025. With the long-awaited release finally on its way, it's worth taking a look back at the story of the other Prime games. And for more, be sure to check out all the biggest Nintendo Direct announcements.

It’s been more than five years now since Nintendo shockingly revealed it was restarting development on Metroid Prime 4. In that span of time, the company has announced and released two high-profile Metroid games for Switch in Metroid Dread and Metroid Prime
title: Metroid Prime 4: The Series' Story So Far

description: The official Xbox Wireless Controller isn't just one of the most versatile and reliable gamepads on the market, it's also one of the most colorful that you can wrap your hands around. Several of the more vibrant designs are on sale, and if you've been looking to grab a spare controller, now is a great time to check out the deals below. Available through Amazon and Walmart, you can save almost $20 on models like the well-camouflaged Arctic Camo, an extremely green variant, the eye-catching
title: Official Xbox Controllers Get Significant Discounts At Amazon And Walmart

description:
The LG 27-Inch UltraGear OLED Gaming Monitor is currently available for its lowest price ever, letting you add it to your battlestation for just $597 (down from $1,000). That's over $400 off its regular price--and with previous discounts only knocking it down by a few hundred bucks, this is a great time to finally upgrade your monitor.

LG 27-Inch UltraGear OLED Gaming Monitor

$597 (was $1,0
title: Save $400 On LG UltraGear OLED Gaming Monitor At Amazon

description:
There hasn't been a new Friday the 13th movie since 2009, but Peacock's prequel series, Crystal Lake, was slated to revive the franchise. Indie studio A24 untangled the complicated rights situation and lined up Bryan Fuller and Jim Danger Gray to serve as co-showrunners. But just a few weeks before production was supposed to begin, Fuller and Gray were fired and the future of Crystal Lake became murky. Now, a new report sheds some light on where Crystal Lake went wrong.

The Wrap has an extensive account of what happened, and two dueling narratives have emerged. One narrative shifts the blame to Fuller and Gray for a bal
title: Report On A24's Friday The 13th Series Reveals Behind-The-Scenes Turmoil

description:
House of the Dragon returned for its second season on June 16, and while the season premiere was down significantly over Season 1's premiere in 2022, the show helped lift Max to its biggest day ever.

House of the Dragon Season 2, Episode 1 reached 7.8 million viewers on HBO and Max on Sunday, June 16, which is down 22% against the 10 million people who watched the series debut in 2022.

Although Season 2's premiere was down in a big way, it still helped Max have its "biggest streaming day ever," according to Warner Bros. Discovery (via Variety). This wasn't necessarily a big surprise, though, given that Max expanded to a major new market, Europe, back in May, and House of the Dragon Season 2 was the first major new release for Max since then.
title: House Of The Dragon Season 2 Viewership Is Way Down Compared To Season 1 Premiere

description:
Director Eli Roth responded to comparisons between his upcoming Borderlands adaptation and Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy. In an interview with Total Film, Roth acknowledged similarities between the projects, explaining, "I was very conscious of not remaking Guardians. [Audiences will] see the movie and recognize its unique approach."

Borderlands, adapted from the popular video game series by Gearbox Software, features an ensemble cast including Kevin Hart, Cate Blanchett, and Jack Black, set in a post-apocalyptic world. The storyline follows Lilith (Blanchett) as she returns to Pandora with the help of a ragtag bunch of misfits to locate the daughter of the universe's most power
title: Borderlands Director Responds To Guardians of the Galaxy Comparisons

description:
Though The Chinese Room has previously worked in the horror genre, I don't think of the team as primarily a horror-centric development studio. Rather, I've long felt its name is synonymous with sadness. The throughline spanning games like Dear Esther, Everybody's Gone to the Rapture, and even Amnesia: A Machine for Pigs is a feeling of melancholy, longing, or even tragedy. Still Wakes The Deep continues this run of depressing games, which I mean as a compliment. By leaning into the studio's forte, the game's memorable horrors become more affecting hardships.

I've found it difficult to write about Still Wakes The Deep as I didn't want to spoil its best aspect--the monster at the root of it all, which isn't shown in any pre-launch materials. But then I discovered how the game has been advertised--"The Thing on an oil rig"--which seems to let me off the hook. As it turns out, that elevator pit
title: Still Wakes The Deep Review - The Abyss Stares Back

description:
Since releasing in 2022, the Elden Ring community has created hundreds of mods for PC players to download. The mods offer a wide variety of add-ons in the Lands Between, including performance boosts, additional gameplay options, and even full, fan-made reworks of the game. While you can choose to sift through all these mods yourself, you can save some time and look at our list of the 25 best Elden Ring mods currently available to download. There's no better time to download some mods than before the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC.

This list contains some of the most popular mods in the Elden Ring community, but there are also some that we feel deserve some extra attention. The mods on
title: Best 25 Elden Ring Mods To Download In 2024

description:
Today, during the June 2024 Nintendo Direct, Capcom announced its next fighting game compilation: Marvel Vs. Capcom Fighting Collection: Arcade Classics, which is a collection of six fighting games and one side-scrolling beat-'em-up from both Marvel and Capcom's deep history.

The collection will add training mode to each game, which will let players hone their skills before challenging other fighters via the built-in rollback netcode across all six fighting games. It will also online leaderboards, which will update in real time and let players see where they stand amongst the rest of the world.

The seven games included in the Marvel Vs. Capcom Fighting Collection are as follows:

Continue Reading at
title: Marvel Vs. Capcom Fighting Collection Drops Six Classic Crossovers Into One Game

description: Backbone has announced a new limited-edition version of its controller, designed in collaboration with award-winning musician--and noted Lord of the Rings fan--Post Malone. This $200 version of the Backbone One sports a translucent green design, a glow-in-the-dark logo, and several hardware upgrades like an aluminum D-pad and laser-etched aluminum face buttons. These will be very limited, as only 500 of them are being produced.
title: Backbone's New Translucent Controller Is A Very Unexpected Crossover

description:
Nintendo Directs have gotten a bit of a reputation of suddenly releasing games mentioned during the presentation, and the June 18 Nintendo Direct was no different. Though some of the "Available Now" announcements weren't quite as exciting as in Directs' past, there's still some games and updates out now that are worth checking out.

For those subscribed to Nintendo Switch Online, a handful of classic games are coming to the service. For Game Boy Advance, the GBA port of The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past and Four Swords combo pack is now playable, along with
title: All The Switch Games And Updates From Today's Nintendo Direct Available Now

description:
Coming soon: Game Pass


In the wake of June's Xbox Games Showcase, Microsoft has announced the latest set of games scheduled to hit Game Pass later this month, including one that's available to play today: Still Wakes The Deep, a hair-raising survival horror title developed by The Chinese Room.

Also included in this month's lineup is My Time At Sandrock, which will join the other titles in the Game Pass catalog on June 19, followed by the 2D sandbox RPG, Keplerth, on June 20. EA Sports FC 24 will arrive a few days later on June 25, along with both SteamWorld Dig and SteamWorld Dig 2, which both hit the catalog on June 26. Lastly, Robin Hood - Sherwood Buil
title: These 7 Games Are Coming To Game Pass This Month

description:
The best racing games have always been technical showpieces on each generation of hardware, with most console makers having their own prestigious franchise to parade around in front of the competition. But the sheer breadth of options has never been wider than in 2024, with a sub-genre for everyone looking to get a high speed thrill.

The beauty of the racing genre is that it can be so many different things to different players. If you want to kick back and enjoy some laps around a circuit, you can play anything from the highly successfully Mario Kart 8 Deluxe to the gorgeous Forza Horizon 5, and enjoy a wealth of options in-between. If you crave something more grounded and challenging, there are numerous options for technical simulation racin
title: The Best Racing Games To Play In 2024

description: Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven, the full 3D remake of a fan-favorite Romancing SaGa 2, is coming to Nintendo Switch, PS5, PS4 and Steam on October 24, 2024. Romancing SaGa 2, the hit RPG that sold more than 1 million copies upon its 1993 release in Japan, was praised by many for its challenge, nonlinear exploration, and deep and unique gameplay mechanics. Revisit the history of the Varennes Empire in the first modern 3D remake of this groundbreaking title and defeat the Seven Heroes - once belo
title: Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven – Announcement Trailer

description: EUREKA! Miles Edgeworth moves beyond the courtroom and straight to the crime scene in Ace Attorney Investigations Collection with revamped graphics, new language options, bonus features, and more! Featuring two remastered titles – Ace Attorney Investigations: Miles Edgeworth and the Western debut of Ace Attorney Investigations 2: Prosecutor’s Gambit – it’s a perfect package. Join the prolific prosecutor himself as he analyzes mind-bending mysteries and cryptic conundrums while seeking out the ultimate tru
title: Ace Attorney Investigations Collection - Reveal Trailer

description: Attention Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack members! These Nintendo 64 and Game Boy Advance games are now available: ✅ The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past Four Swords ✅ Metroid: Zero Mission ✅ Turok: Dinosaur Hunter ✅ Perfect Dark Perfect Dark and Turok: Dinosaur Hunter are playable via the Nintendo 64 – Nintendo Switch Online: Mature app, available now to Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack members.
title: Nintendo Switch Online - Perfect Dark, Metroid: Zero Mission And More Expansion Pack Update Trailer

description: Takumi Sumino has a unique requirement at the Last Defense Academy. Defend the school from hostile student enemies for 100 days! Help Takumi survive this 100-day trial in The Hundred Line -Last Defense Academy-, launching on Nintendo Switch early next year.
title: The Hundred Line -Last Defense Academy- | Official Announcement Trailer

description:
Announced through June's Nintendo Direct, Among Us' newest major update brings two new crewmate roles, one new imposter role, improved UI features, additional lobby presets, and more.

The two new crewmate roles are the Tracker and the Noisemaker. The Tracker is able to track and locate a crewmate's position on the map to sus out the Imposter. The Noisemaker, on the other hand, sends out a distress signal when killed. The visual indicator from the Noisemaker's death is able to easily rally and pinpoint the Noisemaker's location to more readily deduce the Imposter.

The Phantom is the final role added in this update: an Imposter role able to vanish for a short amount of time. Using this vanishing ability to escape or secure a kill makes the Phantom a swift assassin who can open up new strategies.
title: Among Us Adds New Ways To Betray Your Friends

description: METAL SLUG ATTACK RELOADED is available later today on Nintendo Switch! METAL SLUG, the classic action shooter, retains its detailed 2D pixel look and is now a tower defense game with beginner-friendly controls! Use all sorts of strategies to crush enemy bases! The game also features “ANOTHER STORY”, which fans won't want to miss, and “GALLERY” Mode. Battle it out with players all over the world for the highest title!
title: METAL SLUG ATTACK RELOADED - Launch Trailer

description: Samus Aran is back! Metroid Prime 4: Beyond will be released on Nintendo Switch in 2025.
title: Metroid Prime 4 Beyond – Official Announcement Gameplay Reveal Trailer

description: Gonna take you for a ride back to the arcades with MARVEL vs. CAPCOM Fighting Collection: Arcade Classics! 7 legendary games, all in one Super Heroic collection, coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and Steam, later in 2024. - X-MEN CHILDREN OF THE ATOM - MARVEL SUPER HEROES - X-MEN VS. STREET FIGHTER - MARVEL SUPER HEROES vs. STREET FIGHTER - MARVEL vs. CAPCOM CLASH OF SUPER HEROES - MARVEL vs. CAPCOM 2 New Age of Heroes - THE PUNISHER Additional enhancements across the collection include cust
title: MARVEL vs. CAPCOM Fighting Collection: Arcade Classics - Announce Trailer

description: HD-2D remakes draws near! Command? Travel through vast worlds and discover where the legendary DRAGON QUEST franchise began with the stunning DRAGON QUEST III HD-2D remake and the newly announced DRAGON QUEST I & II HD-2D Remake!! DRAGON QUEST III HD-2D Remake comes to Nintendo Switch on November 14, 2024. DRAGON QUEST I & II HD-2D Remake comes to Nintendo Switch in 2025.
title: DRAGON QUEST III HD-2D Remake – Release Date Trailer

description:
The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power Season 2 will premiere later this summer, promising a darker tone compared to previous depictions of Middle-earth. This next season will focus on the lore-rich world's villains, as stated by showrunners Patrick McKay and J.D. Payne to Total Film in their new issue.

"We like to say that Season 1 was primarily about our heroes," McKay and Payne said. "But Season 2 is all about the villains." The recently released trailer's reveal of showing Sauron at the height of his power, now with a new disguise.

"This time, Sauron's agenda sets everything in motion: Adar [Sam Hazeldine, taking over th
title: Lord Of The Rings: Rings Of Power Season 2 Is "All About The Villains"

description:
See ya


As it does usually twice per month, Microsoft is soon set to dump a few more titles from the Game Pass library. There are six games in all leaving by the end of June or early July.

These include FIFA 22 (but don't worry, FC 24 is joining Game Pass on June 25), along with Stranded Deep. Microsoft also revealed one of the games leaving in July, and it's Cricket 22.

As usual, Game Pass subscribers can grab the outgoing games before they're gone for a 20% discount as part of their membership.

In terms of new additions to the Game Pass catalog, the library adds Still Wakes the Deep, My Time at Sandrock, Keplerth, FC 24, and more in the final two weeks of June. Check out GameSpot's rundown of
title: Xbox Game Pass Dumps These 6 Games Very Soon

description:
Nintendo's Metroid Prime 4 was announced all the way back in 2017 for the Nintendo Switch, but the game has never materialized, leading some to believe if it was still happening at all. The game, now retitled Metroid Prime 4: Beyond, is very much alive, as Nintendo re-revealed Metroid Prime 4 during the Nintendo Direct event today and confirmed a 2025 release window.

A trailer during the Nintendo Direct revealed showed Samus exploring an alien planet that appears to be under siege between alien factions. We saw plenty of Prime-action like scanning creatures and lock-on targeting for enemies, and the end of the trailer showed what appeared to be this game's villain: a humanoid character flanked by two Metroids like bodyguards.

In 2019, Nintendo
title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond Re-Revealed With Impressive Trailer And 2025 Release Date

description:
During today's Nintendo Direct presentation, Sunblink announced that Hello Kitty Island Adventure--the Animal-Crossing-esque life sim featuring multiple characters from the Sanrio universe--will make its console and PC debut in 2025.

The game will first launch on PC and Nintendo Switch as a timed console exclusive, with ports on PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5 arriving later in the year. No Xbox version of the life sim was mentioned in the official announcement.

Hello Kitty Island Adventure was previously exclusive to Apple Arcade, and it was nominated for Best Mobile Game at The Game Awards last year. Player
title: Hello Kitty Island Adventure Sails To Nintendo Switch And PC In 2025

description: The biggest Mario Party yet, Super Mario Party Jamboree launches on Nintendo Switch October 17th! Take on over 110 minigames, 7 game boards (5 new boards and 2 returning boards), and join up to 20 players head-to-head online in Koopathlon mode!
title: Super Mario Party Jamboree Official Announcement Trailer

description: It's up to Princess Zelda to save Hyrule in a brand-new The Legend of Zelda story. The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom launches September 26th on Nintendo Switch!
title: The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom – Announcement Trailer

description:
Nintendo announced the next wave of games for its Nintendo Switch Online subscription service during the June 2024 Nintendo Direct. A handful of classic games are coming to the service starting today, including online play for a Zelda classic.

The Zelda game is Four Swords, a cooperative four-player Game Boy Advance game that will now feature online play to conquer its dungeons and challenges. The GBA selection is also adding Metroid: Zero Mission, the GBA retelling of the very first Metroid game that is considered a classic in its own right. Meanwhile, the N64 is getting two new entries as well: Turok Dinosaur Hunter, and the very first Perfect Dark. All of these will be available today.

The Nintendo Switch Online service--and its Expansion Pass, which includes access to DLC and more systems' games--has grown considerably since
title: Nintendo Switch Online Adding More GBA And N64 Games Today, Including Zelda And Perfect Dark

description:
During today's Nintendo Direct presentation, Nintendo announced Super Mario Party Jamboree, a new installment in the Mario Party franchise which adds new minigames, boards, and a 20-player online experience.

Super Mario Party Jamboree is set on an island resort split which is split into five boards, three of which are new and two of which are returning from previous Mario Party games. Jamboree will offer over 110 minigames, which is the most for any Mario Party entry in the franchise's history.

Jamboree also introduces a new Koopathlon online mode, where up to 20 players can meet to compete in special minigame challenges. Koopathlon challenges shown in the announcement trailer include a chase scene involving Bowser and a crane game where scores depend on how many coins are collected.
title: Super Mario Party Jamboree Lets You Party Online With 20 Friends

description: Take on over 150 speedrunning challenges, face off against the best times of players of different skill levels in Survival Mode, and put your skills to the ultimate test in Legend Challenges from across 13 NES games when Nintendo World Championships: NES Edition arrives on Nintendo Switch July 18, 2024! Will you be the last one standing?
title: Nintendo World Championships NES Edition – Survival Mode & Legend Challenge Trailer

description: The father of FINAL FANTASY, Hironobu Sakaguchi, and renowned composer Nobuo Uematsu return to deliver an original RPG story! Experience an enhanced version of FANTASIAN Neo Dimension, with brand new features including English and Japanese voice overs and an additional difficulty option. Assume the role of Leo, as he journeys to recover his memories and solve the mystery of a strange mechanical infection destroying his world. Experience an original and modern take on the beloved turn-based battle system
title: FANTASIAN Neo Dimension Official Trailer

description:
The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom was announced during the Nintendo Direct--it's a new Zelda game in the Link's Awakening art style. This game stars Zelda as the main protagonist and launches on September 26.

Echoes of Wisdom stars Zelda as she must fight to save the kingdom and Link. Her main power is the use of Echoes, which allows her to create duplicates of any item she finds the echo for. This means tables, beds, and even spike obstacles that she can use to solve puzzles and dungeons.

Mysterious rifts have been appearing across Hyrule, stealing away people, including Link. This forces Zelda to take action, using her new Echo ability to replicate items. During the Direct, it was revealed that Zelda won't fight the way Link traditionally does, instead using the Echoes to fight. She can both create weapons like a rock to fight with
title: The Legend Of Zelda: Echoes Of Wisdom, Starring Zelda, Launches September 26

description:
Donkey Kong Country Returns HD was announced at the June 2024 Nintendo Direct. Donkey Kong Country Returns was originally released on the Nintendo Wii, then the 3DS, and now it's making its way to the Nintendo Switch on January 16, 2025.

The new release of Donkey Kong Country Returns includes updated graphics and some of the exclusive levels from the Nintendo 3DS release as well. The game stars both Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong as they track down the Tiki Tak Tribe, who has stolen all of their bananas. Donkey Kong Country Returns HD also features two player co-op across all 80 levels.

The king of Kong returns!
Originally released on the Wii system, #DonkeyKong Country Returns HD is barrelin
title: Donkey Kong Country Returns HD Comes To Nintendo Switch In January

description: Prep the airlock and join your Crewmates in a multiplayer game of teamwork and betrayal in Among Us! All new Roles (Noisemaker, Tracker, and Phantom) add another layer of deception - out now on Nintendo Switch!
title: Among Us - New Roles Official Trailer

description:
The Dragon Quest series had a prominent showing at the June 2024 Nintendo Direct. The previously announced Dragon Quest 3 HD-2D Remake's release date was confirmed alongside confirmation that an HD-2D remake of Dragon Quest 1 & 2 are on the way.

"Chronologically, Dragon Quest 3 comes first in the Erdrick trilogy. I think players will have fun seeing how things unfold if they play [Dragon Quest] 3, 1, and 2 in that order," said Dragon Quest series creator and game designer Yuji Horii.

The previously announced Dragon Quest 3 HD-2D Remake's release date was confirmed alongside confirmation that an HD-2D remake of Dragon Quest 1 & 2 is on the way. Dragon Quest 3 HD-2D Remake will be released on November 14, with Dragon Quest 1 & 2 HD-2D Remake slated for release in 2025.
title: Dragon Quest 1 & 2 HD-2D Remake Announced, DQ3 Release Date Confirmed

description: The final battle of FAIRY TAIL begins this winter on Nintendo Switch! Experience the final battle of Natsu and his friends in an epic, action RPG! This new game depicts the final chapter of the original work like only KOEI TECMO and GUST can deliver.
title: FAIRY TAIL 2 Official Trailer

description:
The last few weeks have seen some big PlayStation and Xbox livestreams, and now it's time for the Nintendo Direct June 2024 livestream and all the announcements that come with it. A Nintendo Direct or a related livestream has been held every June since 2012, and this year's edition will be focused on games being released in the latter half of 2024. Like previous livestreams during the Summer Showcase month, we'll be covering this event live and you can periodically hit your F5 key to refresh this page to see the latest announcements.

The
title: Nintendo Direct June 2024: All The Biggest Announcements
